file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: NFT Schema API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/dar":
    get:
      summary: Returns a list of Digital Asset Registry (DAR) in this service.
      operationId: dar_list
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/DARList"
        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
  "/dar/{name}":
    get:
      summary: Returns the schema of the scpecified DAR
      operationId: dar_get_by_name
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: name of the DAR
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/DARSchema"
        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
  "/dar/{name}/asset/{asset_id}":
    get:
      summary: Returns the token and its schema
      operationId: dar_asset_get
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: name of the DAR
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: asset_id
          in: path
          description: Asset ID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/AssetSchema"
        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
  "/dar/{name}/address/{address}":
    get:
      summary: Returns a list of assets owned by the user
      operationId: dar_user_asset_list
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: path
          description: name of the DAR
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: address
          in: path
          description: Address of the user
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/AssetList"
        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"
  "/address/{address}":
    get:
      summary: Returns a list of all the assets owned by the user
      operationId: user_asset_list
      parameters:
        - name: address
          in: path
          description: Address of the user
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/AssetList"
        default:
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "src/schema.json#/definitions/ErrorResponse"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/address/{address}": get: operation "user_asset_list": responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: at 1:335: external "src/schema.json": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
